title: Wear Hydrate Me
summary: Track your daily water consumption and remind yourself to stay hydrated.
developerAddress:
Aeus Tech, Inc.
2nd Floor, Emmanuel Business Center,
Sen. Benigno Aquino Avenue, Diversion Road., Iloilo City
description: Stay hydrated! Hydrate Me is a simple Android Wear app that reminds and tracks your daily water intake. Customize goals and set your daily alarm to stay refreshed and healthy throughout the day.- Simple, One-Touch Interface = ‘TAP’ to record- Customizable Goals and Alarm- Track Your Daily Water Intake- Unlock Monthly Progress (In-App Purchase)COMPATIBLE ANDROID WEAR DEVICES:Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch and/or Moto 360 running Android 4.3 or higherDesigned / Developed by AEUS TECH IncSay hello at: info@aeustech.com
descriptionHTML:
Stay hydrated! Hydrate Me is a simple Android Wear app that reminds and tracks your daily water intake. Customize goals and set your daily alarm to stay refreshed and healthy throughout the day.

- Simple, One-Touch Interface = ‘TAP’ to record
- Customizable Goals and Alarm
- Track Your Daily Water Intake
- Unlock Monthly Progress (In-App Purchase)


COMPATIBLE ANDROID WEAR DEVICES:
Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch and/or Moto 360 running Android 4.3 or higher


Designed / Developed by AEUS TECH Inc
Say hello at: info@aeustech.com
comments: Great app that is easy to use Everyone needs to drink more water this is a quick reminder to help you reach your goal. Easy to record your water with just a tap. I like the 5 minute snooze if I'm not able to drink water I can snooze it and attempt to get it done within 5 minutes and no fear of forgetting. Very easy to adjust to fit you. Using on a Moto 360 v2.

Helpful, but I would like it to remember that I want to drink a specified number of glasses every day - I drink 11 8 oz and I have to set it every day. If I am target I still get the alarms which is annoying. I would like to set when I should drink and if I input that I drank water then I should not get the alarm. Keep updating please it is a beautiful and clean design.
Cool app Simple and easy to use.
I bought the app but i didn't get it on samsung gear s3 neither my telephone , where it is
Add an option to disable it on weekends.
Does Exactly what it says...I LOVE this app!
